title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes exactly one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes exactly two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes exactly three of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes exactly four of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes exactly five of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes exactly six of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes all of the following criteria.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes exactly one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes exactly two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes exactly three of the following criteria.
